title: ConflictTermValue
description: The conflict property SHOULD take one of the following Conflict Strategy Preference values (instance of the ConflictTerm class): 1. perm: the Permissions MUST override the Prohibitions. 2. prohibit: the Prohibitions MUST override the Permissions. 3. invalid: the entire Policy MUST be void if any conflict is detected. If the conflict property is not explicitly set, the default of invalid will be used.
